doc:
Andy Cunningham (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andy_Cunningham_(actor) 0 Andrew Cunningham (13 May 1950 – 5 June 2017) was an English actor, puppeteer, ventriloquist and writer. He was best known as the creator and main writer of the children's BBC television series, Bodger Badger, in which he acted as the likeable but accident prone Simon Bodger and his pet, Badger. Andrew_Cunningham ( 13_May_1950 – 5_June_2017 ) was an_English_actor , puppeteer , ventriloquist_and_writer . He was_best_known as the_creator_and_main_writer of the_children 's_BBC_television_series , Bodger_ , in which he acted as the_likeable_but_accident_prone_Simon_Bodger and his_pet , Badger .
